headline: The 3-Step Path to Data Clarity
subheadline: Our proven process turns your data mess into a strategic asset.

steps.title: Step 1: Data Health Check
steps.description: A two-week audit that shows where your data is strong, where it leaks time or money, and the quick fixes to get back control. Clarity in 2 weeks. Our Health Check is aligned with the Australian Bureau of Statistics (ABS) Data Quality Framework, giving you a trusted, industry-standard benchmark.

steps.title: Step 2: Interactive Data Apps
steps.description: Lightweight apps built around your workflow—so you can explore data, ask questions, and get real-time answers without spreadsheets. From reports you forget to tools you use every day.

steps.title: Step 3: Data Strategy & Advisory
steps.description: Ongoing guidance to turn insights into action—defining the right KPIs, spotting opportunities, and building a roadmap for growth. Stop guessing. Start growing.
